abstract: A set of options affecting the delivery of still image representations of Photos assets you request from an image manager.
rawMarkdown:
---
source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/Photos/PHImageRequestOptions
crawled: 2025-12-07T16:48:02Z

# PHImageRequestOptions

**Class**

A set of options affecting the delivery of still image representations of Photos assets you request from an image manager.

## Declaration

```swift
class PHImageRequestOptions
```

## Scheduling an Image Request

- **isSynchronous**: A Boolean value that determines whether Photos processes the image request synchronously.

## Specifying Image Request Options

- **version**: The version of the image to be requested.
- **PHImageRequestOptionsVersion**: Options for requesting an image asset with or without adjustments, used by the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHImageRequestOptions/version] property.
- **deliveryMode**: The requested image quality and delivery priority.
- **PHImageRequestOptionsDeliveryMode**: Options for delivering requested image data, used by the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHImageRequestOptions/deliveryMode] property.
- **resizeMode**: A mode that specifies how to resize the requested image.
- **PHImageRequestOptionsResizeMode**: Options for how to resize the requested image to fit a target size, used by the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHImageRequestOptions/resizeMode] property.
- **normalizedCropRect**: A rectangle for requesting a cropped version of the original image.

## Fetching Image Data from iCloud

- **isNetworkAccessAllowed**: A Boolean value that specifies whether Photos can download the requested image from iCloud.
- **progressHandler**: A block that Photos calls periodically while downloading the image.
- **PHAssetImageProgressHandler**: The signature for a block that Photos calls while downloading asset data from iCloud. Used by the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHImageRequestOptions/progressHandler] property.

## Instance Properties

- **allowSecondaryDegradedImage**

## Asset loading

- **Loading and Caching Assets and Thumbnails**: Request image, video, or Live Photos content, and cache for quick reuse.
- **PHImageManager**: An object that facilitates retrieving or generating preview thumbnails and asset data.
- **PHCachingImageManager**: An object that facilitates retrieving or generating preview thumbnails, optimized for batch preloading large numbers of assets.
- **PHVideoRequestOptions**: A set of options affecting the delivery of video asset data that you request from an image manager.
- **PHLivePhotoRequestOptions**: A set of options affecting the delivery of Live Photo assets you request from an image manager.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
